summary: This document is a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell to Scott Stackman at UBS Financial Services, authorizing a wire transfer of $1,807,570.25 to a specified account. The letter includes banking details for the transfer and is marked as confidential.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the sender of the letter, authorizing a wire transfer.

persons.name: Scott Stackman
persons.context: Scott Stackman is the recipient of the letter from Ghislaine Maxwell, representing UBS Financial Services.

locations: 1000 Venetian Way Apt. 801, Miami Beach, FL 33139
299 Park Avenue, 25th Floor, New York, NY 10171
Capital One Bank, New Orleans, LA
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell authorized a wire transfer of $1,807,570.25.
The transfer was directed to an account titled 'GlobalFlows Inc FRO GlobalFlows Shareholder Paying Account'.
